## tbl_uncache

## Description
Force a Spark table with name `name` to be unloaded from memory. 


## Usage
```r
tbl_uncache(sc, name) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | A `spark_connection`. |
| name | The table name. |
